articles.title: McKenna tests positive for COVID-19, Essendon-Melbourne postponed - The Age
articles.description: Essendon star Conor McKenna has tested positive for COVID-19.
articles.content:
"We need to do the right thing, the right thing for our clubs and community, is to postpone this game between Essendon and Melbourne."
